info.name: Discord Dark Maroon
info.description:
A dark theme for Discord based on Slack's aubergine/maroon style.
Tested with Chrome and Firefox Nightly.
info.additionalInfo: Enable Discord Dark Mode in Settings > Appearence for this theme! Issues: https://github.com/phit/discord-maroon-theme/issues Changelog: https://github.com/phit/discord-maroon-theme/commits/master
